note: digitalWrite(greenLED,LOW); digitalWrite(yellowLED,LOW); digitalWrite(redLED,LOW); break; case 2: digitalWrite(greenLED,HIGH); digitalWrite(yellowLED,LOW); digitalWrite(redLED,LOW); break; case 3: digitalWrite(greenLED,HIGH); digitalWrite(yellowLED,HIGH); digitalWrite(redLED,LOW); break; case 4: digitalWrite(greenLED,HIGH); digitalWrite(yellowLED,HIGH); digitalWrite(redLED,HIGH); break;

digitalWrite(relayPin,HIGH); tone(buzzerPin,NOTE_A4); digitalWrite(greenLedPin,HIGH); digitalWrite(yellowLedPin,HIGH); digitalWrite(redLedPin,HIGH); delay(1000); tone(buzzerPin,NOTE_A3); digitalWrite(greenLedPin,LOW); digitalWrite(yellowLedPin,LOW); digitalWrite(redLedPin,LOW); delay(1000); noTone(buzzerPin);
